Rat King

The Rat King is a special NPC found in the Sewers level of Remixed Pixel Dungeon.

Description

The Rat King is a non-hostile NPC that appears in a special room in the Sewers. He starts in a sleeping state and upon being awakened, he gives the player a Rat King Crown and wanders around. If the player attacks him or becomes too aggressive, he becomes hostile.

Stats

  • HP: 30
  • HT: 30
  • Attack Skill: 15
  • Defense Skill: 20
  • Min Damage: 4
  • Max Damage: 10
  • Damage Resistance: 5
  • Experience for Kill: 1

Behavior

  • Initially in a sleeping state
  • Awakens when player interacts with him
  • Gives player a Rat King Crown on first interaction
  • Becomes hostile if attacked (anger level increases with each interaction)
  • Wanders around when awakened
  • Moves at twice the normal speed
  • Only remains friendly if anger level is less than 2

Location

  • Found exclusively in the Sewers level (depths 1-5)
  • Appears in a special “Rat King” room type
  • Part of the sewers' unique content

Interactions

  • First interaction: Wakes up, delivers dialogue, and gives Rat King Crown
  • Subsequent interactions: Each interaction increases anger level
  • When hostile: Switches to hunting AI and attacks the player

Strategy

The Rat King is an important part of the early game content in the sewers. Players should be careful not to anger him until they have received the Rat King Crown, after which he can either be avoided or defeated for the item. He's an important source of the Rat King Crown, which provides a helpful buff.

Data Validation

This information is extracted directly from the game code and validated against the source implementation. The details are accurate as of the referenced source files and provide reliable information about the NPC mechanics.
